title: Audiophile Recommendations
subtitle: A comprehensive platform to host B_Media's Gear recommendations in a more thoughtful way!
description: A custom website for B_Media and Axel's audiophile gear recommendations.

content.heading: The Inspiration
content.text:
I'm a big fan of B_Media's content - I watch Axel's daily videos and find his gear recommendations incredibly valuable and useful. He has a recommendation list, that while comprehensive, it was hosted on a basic Linktree page that made it cumbersome to browse through products. Watching Axel's detailed thought videos on each item was also constantly requiring a manual tiktok search.

The interface felt cluttered and hard to navigate. I wanted a better way to explore their recommendations that would make the browsing experience more pleasant and organized. It's my way to help the Audio community without being much of a savvy myself.

content.heading: Building the Solution
content.text: I took it upon myself to create a custom web platform that would properly showcase B_Media's audiophile gear recommendations. I built a clean interface with:
list: Detailed product cards with specifications and reviews
Mobile-optimized layout design for better usability
Professional presentation that tries to match B_Media's brand as best as I can

content.heading: The Response
content.text:
I shared the project with the B_Media Discord server moderation team and Axel himself, and they absolutely loved it! The improved user experience and presentation resonated with them, and they decided to add my platform alongside their official Linktree link!! :D

It's incredibly rewarding to see my work being appreciated by the community I built it for.
